title: Generate Paintings By Image Style Transfer
description: Hello everyone! One way to generate new paintings is to transfer the style of the target artist (Claude Monet) to already existings images of real life. Here I randomly picked a real life image from Open Images Dataset and converted it using the painting style of Monet. This is a work in progress. Please upvote to keep this going.Thank you and stay safe!
description_lemmatized: hello everyone one way generate new painting transfer style target artist claude monet already existings image real life randomly picked real life image open image dataset converted using painting style monet work progress please upvote keep goingthank stay safe
